ALAS2-2023-2062

Amazon Linux 2 Security Advisory: ALAS-2023-2062
Advisory Release Date: 2023-05-25 17:41 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2023-06-01 23:37 Pacific
Severity: Important
References: CVE-2020-8517 
FAQs regarding Amazon Linux ALAS/CVE Severity
Issue Overview:

An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.10. Due to incorrect input validation, the NTLM authentication credentials parser in ext_lm_group_acl may write to memory outside the credentials buffer. On systems with memory access protections, this can result in the helper process being terminated unexpectedly. This leads to the Squid process also terminating and a denial of service for all clients using the proxy. (CVE-2020-8517)


Affected Packages:

squid


Issue Correction:
Run yum update squid to update your system.

New Packages:
aarch64:
    squid-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.aarch64
    squid-sysvinit-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.aarch64
    squid-migration-script-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.aarch64
    squid-debuginfo-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.aarch64

i686:
    squid-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.i686
    squid-sysvinit-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.i686
    squid-migration-script-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.i686
    squid-debuginfo-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.i686

src:
    squid-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.src

x86_64:

    squid-sysvinit-3.5.20-17.amzn2.7.4.x86_64
